1.0.name: wordpress/winter
1.0.description: In the winter sunshine, glittering snowflakes，they are lovely and comforting. Template "winter" is designed by wpart. Winter support custom menu, header image, custom-background,layout choices - Content on left  and Content on right . And then a small button“Back To Top”will bring more conveniences for users.a wordpress theme for wpart.org .
